diagnoses.label: Stent placement
evidence_spans: Successful stenting of the left anterior descending diagonal.

medications.name: Aspirin
evidence_spans: We have stented the culprit lesion. The patient will receive a course of aspirin, Plavix, Integrilin, and statin therapy.

medications.name: Plavix
evidence_spans: We have stented the culprit lesion. The patient will receive a course of aspirin, Plavix, Integrilin, and statin therapy.

evidence_spans: We have stented the culprit lesion. The patient will receive a course of aspirin, Plavix, Integrilin, and statin therapy.

medications.name: Statin
evidence_spans: We have stented the culprit lesion. The patient will receive a course of aspirin, Plavix, Integrilin, and statin therapy.
We have stented the culprit lesion. The patient will receive a course of aspirin, Plavix, Integrilin, and statin therapy.

patient_summary: The patient had a heart catheterization to check their heart. They had a blockage in a blood vessel in their heart, and doctors put a stent in it to open it up. The patient will need to take aspirin, Plavix, and Integrilin to help prevent more blockages. They will also need to take a statin. The patient will need to follow up with a cardiologist in one week.

missing_info.why_required: To ensure patient is taking the correct medications.
To ensure patient is following up with the correct provider and at the correct time.

notes: Confidence levels are based on the information provided in the clinical note. Some information is missing, so confidence is low.
